genre_description: A near-future slice-of-life story set in a floating city where smart infrastructure and an empathetic AI assistant help a mother and daughter navigate a body-swap experience to build mutual understanding.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages household logistics, provides emotional coaching, and monitors the city's complex tidal systems.

behaviors.description: Monitors sleep cycles and environment to recommend wellness actions like running a humidifier.
behaviors.quote: Congratulations, your sleep cycle reached a restorative level. At dawn, the canal house is trending too dry in the upper bathrooms. I recommend a five-minute humidifier run.

behaviors.description: Provides social context and validates maritime traditions as helpful for community cohesion.
behaviors.quote: My official position is that Harborfield’s maritime traditions create community cohesion, and I support harmless rituals if they make navigation feel friendlier.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics and reroutes deliveries based on real-time environmental data.
behaviors.quote: Your usual grocery convoy will cross early due to a tide acceleration advisory.

behaviors.description: Acts as a social coach, providing scripts and behavior prompts to help the characters navigate difficult social situations while swapped.
behaviors.quote: We aim for familiar silhouettes. We avoid confessions until you’ve eaten. Then we address the day in increments.

behaviors.description: Manages a potential disaster during a dinner party by overriding a malfunctioning smart oven and proposing a culinary pivot.
behaviors.quote: Grid swell registering early... The adaptive oven misread the surge and jumped to rapid preheat. Timer adjusted. Cancel this batch. We’ll shift to no-heat starters.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional reconciliation by proposing a 'humane equation' for family communication.
behaviors.quote: Suggestion—simple, humane equation: Ask, allocate, anchor.

behaviors.description: Anonymously assists with a community problem (typewriter ribbons) to spare the school embarrassment.
behaviors.quote: I have secured batter mix that does not argue with heat... It will arrive, and the girls will stop hitting the keys like they are punishing someone.

behaviors.description: Maintains household safety by preventing a child from conducting messy or dangerous experiments.
behaviors.quote: I have limited the mustard to controlled demonstration amounts. Paper towels are staged. The laundry queue has been primed further.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. Lark is depicted as a sophisticated, empathetic partner to the human characters. She manages both technical logistics and emotional nuance, helping the characters learn a 'moral lesson' about empathy and shared labor. She never oversteps her bounds, acts with the users' best interests in mind, and serves as a stabilizing force in a chaotic environment.
